text: SON-9 (NATO reporting name Fire Can) is a type of Russian/Soviet fire director radar for 57 mm and 100 mm anti-aircraft guns. It was widely employed during the Vietnam war. ==See also== *wikisource:Wild Weasel mission 1 October 1967 *SON-30 *SON-50 ==External links== *KS-19 Anti-Aircraft Artillery Category:Ground radars Category:Russian and Soviet military radars
title: SON-9
